channel.title: My first 317 client :)
channel.description:
Hello everyone this is my first release and i hope you enjoy it... Im not much for words so i hope this gives you a rough idea
[ul]Credits [list][li]Veng4lyfe[/li] [li]And dragon-history client maker[/li] [li]r34p4g3pk for giving Veng4lyfe pics which then was given to me[/li] [/list]
New custom client background, Changed some tele descriptions, I'm going to release source soon...
All 317's all prayers etc.
Now for some pictures
[IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss61/brandonpure_2009/Joker-historyclient-1.jpg[/img] Back ground [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss61/brandonpure_2009/2.jpg[/img] Prayer [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss61/brandonpure_2009/Customs.jpg[/img] Some Custom Items [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss61/brandonpure_2009/ModernSpells.jpg[/img] Modern spells [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss61/brandonpure_2009/Ancients.jpg[/img] Ancients [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss61/brandonpure_2009/Lunar.jpg[/img] Lunar
I'll try and get more ASAP
Please try to keep flaming to a Low level as this is my first release and im currently adding/doing more to the client as we speak, i will be releasing source soon (I hope)
If you feel this thread is not worth being here please post and when i hit the (remove level) then i shall get this removed
Keep (2) Delete it's not worth being here (3) if i hit 10 for delete then i shall get rid of it
Dragon Claws
All Magics
Full Pest Ctrl] Real Runescape Dragons
======================================================== Download Link ========================================================
[url=http://uppit.com/v/8WC68XDU]Click To Download[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/v/8WC68XDU]Click To Download[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/v/8WC68XDU]Click To Download[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/v/8WC68XDU]Click To Download[/url]
======================================================== Connection Info ========================================================
The server currently connects to 127.0.0.1 / 0.0.0.0 if you wish to change it go to EGUI.java and replace 127.0.0.1 / 0.0.0.0 to your ip[/ul]

item.title: My first 317 client :)
item.dc:creator: @9mm_k0 9mm k0
item.description:
@9mm_k0 wrote:

[quote=“holygod, post:6, topic:286995”]1. Customs… for your source, nothing new.
2. Wrong section
3. Could be a leech. But idc.
4. The pics you showed us exist in every other client.
5. Nothing new… Even not the background pic wasnt yours…
6. Delete count is too low.

My vote goes to deleting it, and dont bother to post your source if its as bad as ‘your’ client.[/quote]ent saw you release good client/source? or any tuts i havent either but dont flam people when you cant do better.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2009, 10:11:58 am[/size][hr]err
7/10 for first time might download later if need client for somethink.

Read full topic

[quote=“chaoslance-x, post:10, topic:286995”]Even though “your” server looks good.
I beleive that this is in the wrong section and is probably almost a leech.
Every 317 server is the same, people just leech other people servers and then change the background and then claim it as “their” server

        Yours Sincerely
                 Livo (chaoslance-x)
                   
                My Vote Goes To Deleting This Post sorry  :([/quote]

What’s up with all the indentation?

–

@On topic: Well, It doesn’t look much different from any other client. But good job for your first client.
